reviewText: My review of the movie series I bought "Legion of Bruce Lee" I give 4 stars, I loved the series, the only reason I didn't give the full 5 stars is because my series collection wasn't in English or no English subtitles, so it was really hard to enjoy it to the fullest because I could not understand the language. If anyone or Amazon.com has the whole series as I do in either English or English subtitled, please let me know!
